data.text: @boclairo82 @ChannelNewsAsia — so I do not see your point in you trying make a backhanded comment about the vaccines, at least we don't die from covid-19? we get covid-19 yes, but we won't get complications. I'd rather stay in the endemic than to go back to a pandemic where the economy slows down.

@boclairo82 @ChannelNewsAsia as I said, it js prevents you from dying of covid-19? you can complain all you want, but it is still a protocol in singapore to be dosed against it. linking this topic back to the article, sg reports 24k+ cases, yes but the govt is aiming for an endemic, we live w the virus —
@abigail_li04 @ChannelNewsAsia Please educate us indeed...flu vaccines are known to have lowest effectiveness of all vaccines...40-50% at best

@boclairo82 @ChannelNewsAsia ? istg idk how many people I jave to explain this to on twitter, but getting the vaccine ≠ prevent you from getting covid-19, it just prevents further complications of you dying from covid-19 lol. The flu jab also don't prevent us from the flu right? Wtf 😭

@ChannelNewsAsia From Day 1 we monitor number of infections, the lower the better. No vaccine time, it remain LOW. Once vaccine roll, cases up. Booster roll, cases up. So clear yet in denial that covid vaccine works. It only work for us to enter places. Covid vaccine NEVER design for covid.
@ChannelNewsAsia Help stop the war in #Ukraine #UkraineRussiaWar https://t.co/Gxt4l1SOW8
@ChannelNewsAsia Very effective boosters..."Getting vaccinated is a simple and effective way to prevent the disease,.."
